content.query:
SELECT TOP (100) [SalesOrder]
,[Channel]
,f.[CustomerKey]
,[ResellerKey]
,[ResellerId]
,[Reseller]
,[SalesAmount] 
 FROM [adworkstarget].[dbo].[Transaction] as f
 left join [adworkstarget].[dbo].[Customer] as c
 on f.CustomerKey = c.CustomerKey
 where c.CustomerKey is null
 and f.CustomerKey is not null
